column4: Hello I'm trying to install Doom 3 , but it gives me an error that I don't have write permissions to /usr/local?
I thought /usr was owned by the user, not root?
no /usr/local is for user stuff that is only specific to the local installation, but can only be written by root
yeah , I just dug something else on google.  Apperently people use the sudo command for the installer, I thought it was some bug with AMD64
